name: Theatrical Producers (except Motion Pictures), Ticket Agencies
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that operate live theatrical productions, such as road
companies and summer theater groups. Services associated with
theatrical productions and concerts are also included, such as casting
agencies, booking agencies, scenery, lighting, and other equipment
services, and theatrical ticket agencies.
For movie theaters, use MCC 7832.
